title: Google\Cloud\Monitoring\V3\UptimeCheckConfig\ResourceGroup
name: ResourceGroup
description:
The resource submessage for group checks. It can be used instead of a monitored resource, when multiple resources are being monitored.

Generated from protobuf message google.monitoring.v3.UptimeCheckConfig.ResourceGroup

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.group_id
params.description: The group of resources being monitored. Should be only the [GROUP_ID], and not the full-path projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]/groups/[GROUP_ID].

params.name: data.resource_type
params.description: The resource type of the group members.
